name: Punch It! (prototype)
description:
A game where you Punch to Advance.

I'm not really a game maker, I'm more of an animator. In this Prototype I wanted to see if I could make a punching mechanic  that feels good. Something that has a lot of "oomph"  to it. I hope I succeeded, let me know what you think!

[Made in Construct 3]
[Sprites created with Aseprite]
